meanings.sent1: The tarantases rattled along the cobblestone street.
meanings.sent2: The tarantases were commonly used for transportation in the 19th century.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they pretended their toy wagon was a grand tarantases.
meanings.sent4: The tarantases glided through the city like a majestic chariot.
meanings.sent5: The shiny black tarantases stood out among the other carriages.

meanings.sent1: We saw a group of tarantases parked outside the museum.
meanings.sent2: The tarantases were beautifully decorated with intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: The tarantases lined up in a row looked like a fleet of elegant carriages.
meanings.sent4: The tarantases in the yard resembled a collection of antique treasures.
meanings.sent5: The colorful tarantases added a festive touch to the parade.
